revised_title: Advances in Aqueous Electrolyte Batteries: Design, Materials, and Challenges
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Energy and Power
tldr: This article discusses the progress and challenges in the development of aqueous electrolyte batteries, focusing on lead-acid and alkaline batteries. It covers various aspects, including materials, design, and battery degradation processes. The article highlights the need for improvements in battery performance, efficiency, and longevity for different applications.
